lead_paragraph: Although some insurance companies announced that adult children could stay on family plans starting months sooner than the law requires, many employers are choosing to wait to implement the changes.
snippet: Although some insurance companies announced that adult children could stay on family plans starting months sooner than the law requires, many employers are choosing to wait to implement the changes.

headline.main: Graduates May See Coverage Gap After All
headline.seo: Many Employer Health Plans Are Not Planning to Cover Adult Children Early
headline.print_headline: Graduates May See Coverage Gap After All
